Description: Blue glazed composition shabti(much of glaze missing) with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding the incised string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with painted Hieroglyphs(now illegible); there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Condition: poor - much of the glaze missing
